item_condition.description: If specified, the condition will only evaluate to true if the item that is being used fulfills the specified item condition type.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the condition will only evaluate to true if the item that is being used fulfills the specified item condition type.

type.description:
## Using Item

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/using_item)

Checks whether the entity is currently using an item (eating a food item, using a shield, drawing a bow, etc.) that fulfills the specified [Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/using_item).

Type ID: `origins:using_item`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:using_item",
    "item_condition": {
        "type": "origins:food"
    }
}
```

This example will check if the entity is currently eating a food item.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Using Item (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-04-04

Using Item

Entity Condition Type

Checks whether the entity is currently using an item (eating a food item, using a shield, drawing a bow, etc.) that fulfills the specified Item Condition Type.

Type ID: origins:using_item

Fields

Field Type Default Description
item_condition Item Condition Type optional If specified, the condition will only evaluate to true if the item that is being used fulfills the specified item condition type.

Examples

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:using_item",
    "item_condition": {
        "type": "origins:food"
    }
}

This example will check if the entity is currently eating a food item.
